event.description: Chone Figgins singles on a line drive to center fielder Ryan Sweeney.
Gary Matthews strikes out swinging.
Bobby Abreu flies out to left fielder Matt Holliday.
Torii Hunter reaches on a fielder's choice, fielded by third baseman Bobby Crosby. Chone Figgins to 2nd.
Mike Napoli strikes out swinging.
Howie Kendrick strikes out swinging.
Kendrys Morales flies out to right fielder Travis Buck.
Juan Rivera reaches on a fielding error by third baseman Bobby Crosby.
Erick Aybar singles on a soft ground ball to second baseman Gregorio Petit. Juan Rivera to 2nd.
Chone Figgins singles on a line drive to center fielder Ryan Sweeney. Juan Rivera scores. Erick Aybar to 3rd.
Gary Matthews singles on a ground ball to shortstop Orlando Cabrera. Erick Aybar scores. Chone Figgins to 2nd.
Bobby Abreu flies out to center fielder Ryan Sweeney.
Torii Hunter grounds out to first baseman Jason Giambi.
Mike Napoli grounds out, third baseman Bobby Crosby to first baseman Jason Giambi.
Howie Kendrick strikes out swinging.
Kendrys Morales flies out to right fielder Travis Buck.
Juan Rivera flies out to left fielder Matt Holliday.
Erick Aybar singles on a line drive to center fielder Ryan Sweeney.
Chone Figgins singles on a soft ground ball to second baseman Gregorio Petit. Erick Aybar to 2nd.
Gary Matthews doubles (3) on a fly ball to center fielder Ryan Sweeney. Erick Aybar scores. Chone Figgins scores.
Bobby Abreu grounds out, third baseman Bobby Crosby to first baseman Jason Giambi.
Torii Hunter walks.
Mike Napoli strikes out swinging.
Howie Kendrick strikes out swinging.
Kendrys Morales flies out to left fielder Matt Holliday.
Juan Rivera doubles (4) on a fly ball to center fielder Ryan Sweeney.
Erick Aybar out on a sacrifice bunt, first baseman Jason Giambi to second baseman Gregorio Petit. Juan Rivera to 3rd.
Chone Figgins out on a sacrifice fly to center fielder Ryan Sweeney. Juan Rivera scores.
Gary Matthews lines out to center fielder Ryan Sweeney.
Pitching Change: Kevin Cameron replaces Dallas Braden.
Bobby Abreu grounds out, second baseman Gregorio Petit to first baseman Jason Giambi.
Torii Hunter singles on a ground ball to center fielder Ryan Sweeney.
Mike Napoli strikes out swinging and Torii Hunter caught stealing 2nd, catcher Kurt Suzuki to second baseman Gregorio Petit.
Howie Kendrick reaches on a throwing error by second baseman Gregorio Petit.
Kendrys Morales called out on strikes.
Juan Rivera strikes out swinging.
With Erick Aybar batting, Howie Kendrick steals (4) 2nd base.
Erick Aybar grounds out to first baseman Jason Giambi.
Pitching Change: Brad Ziegler replaces Kevin Cameron.
Chone Figgins strikes out swinging.
Gary Matthews strikes out swinging.
Bobby Abreu grounds out, first baseman Jason Giambi to pitcher Brad Ziegler.
Ryan Sweeney grounds out, pitcher Shane Loux to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
Orlando Cabrera grounds out, third baseman Chone Figgins to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
Jason Giambi strikes out on a foul tip.
Matt Holliday hit by pitch.
Jack Cust singles on a line drive to left fielder Juan Rivera. Matt Holliday to 2nd.
Kurt Suzuki flies out to center fielder Torii Hunter.
Travis Buck doubles (1) on a fly ball to left fielder Juan Rivera. Matt Holliday scores. Jack Cust to 3rd.
Bobby Crosby walks.
Gregorio Petit grounds into a double play, shortstop Erick Aybar to second baseman Howie Kendrick to first baseman Kendrys Morales. Bobby Crosby out at 2nd.
Ryan Sweeney grounds out, shortstop Erick Aybar to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
Orlando Cabrera singles on a fly ball to center fielder Torii Hunter.
Jason Giambi strikes out swinging and Orlando Cabrera caught stealing 2nd, catcher Mike Napoli to shortstop Erick Aybar.
Matt Holliday called out on strikes.
Jack Cust doubles (4) on a line drive to right fielder Gary Matthews.
Kurt Suzuki grounds out, shortstop Erick Aybar to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
Travis Buck grounds out, second baseman Howie Kendrick to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
Bobby Crosby singles on a line drive to center fielder Torii Hunter.
Gregorio Petit grounds into a double play, shortstop Erick Aybar to second baseman Howie Kendrick to first baseman Kendrys Morales. Bobby Crosby out at 2nd.
Ryan Sweeney grounds out, second baseman Howie Kendrick to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
Orlando Cabrera grounds out, shortstop Erick Aybar to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
Jason Giambi flies out to left fielder Juan Rivera.

Travis Buck pops out to third baseman Chone Figgins.
Pitching Change: Darren Oliver replaces Shane Loux.
Bobby Crosby flies out to center fielder Torii Hunter.
Gregorio Petit grounds out, third baseman Chone Figgins to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
Ryan Sweeney called out on strikes.
Pitching Change: Scot Shields replaces Darren Oliver.
Orlando Cabrera flies out to right fielder Gary Matthews.
Jason Giambi walks.
Matt Holliday homers (3) on a fly ball to center field. Jason Giambi scores.
Pitching Change: Brian Fuentes replaces Scot Shields.
Jack Cust grounds out to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
Kurt Suzuki grounds out, shortstop Erick Aybar to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
